column5: Would like to go ice fishing tomorrow (Sun) but not sure how the recent thaw effected the ice. Im guessing it's still pretty safe but will be slushy. I'm in hamilton and there was about 18" of ice last Saturday, anyone fished today how much of the ice did we loose?
You probably gained a bunch after the melt/refreeze.

I was on bald lake, lost a stack of snow, now we have 22 inches under a crust and 3 inches of water. Later this week will be even more ice - slushy for sure today good luck getting huts of next weekend in Kawarthas as they are now in ice, never used a flame thrower before!
Lots of ice, but some deep slush beds for the bikes and sleds.  Walking conditions are getting pretty good, and will be better still in a day or 2.  A lot of the snow has been knocked down.
The walking on Simcoe was not bad yesterday.Had the odd 6" sink down,but not many times.Should be even better today.
